attributes.action: More funding for mental health hospital
attributes.additional_details: Because it is close to my heart and I have experienced it
attributes.background: To fund more for mental health because there is shortages in beds and people are not getting the proper help they need so they get discharge whilst in crisis. There is also massive cut down on mental health staff members leaving which is leaving a massive shortage. Mental health community is shock

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund mental health units in all hospitals in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581452

Provide more funds and resources to Mental Health services & charities: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595467

Fund mental health walk-in centres for every district: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596962

Fund a 24-hour NHS mental health helpline and treatment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585974

You can find out how to access NHS mental health services here: https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/nhs-services/how-to-access-mental-health-services/

And if you're concerned about yourself or a loved one, you can find out how you can get help from a mental health charity or organisation here: https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/charity-and-voluntary-services/get-help-from-mental-health-helplines/
